title: Kalista black spear wont rebind.
body: My blitz sup AFK'd after trolling and I couldnt rebind to anyone else.  Really neat.  Get a troll afk and this sweet bug.

replies.body: its not a bug that's how the champion works neat huh
you cant rebind after level 6 im pretty sure. like once you cast it once, that person is your pokemon.
